faqs.title: What is Frontend Society about?
faqs.content: Frontend Society is a site for web developers who wants to improve their skills and keep up-to-date about the latest web news.

faqs.title: Do I need to pay to access the content?
faqs.content: No. the content here is totally free and open source. Feel free to explore it.

faqs.title: Can I suggest topics for future articles?
Who is the developer behind Frontend Society?
faqs.content: My name is Ignacio Figueroa, I'm from Argentina and I'm a frontend development enthusiast who loves to share what I learn through my constant learning.
